bibl.title: D. OBBINK and P.J. PARSONS, with contributions by H. AMIRAV, C.F.L. AUSTIN, L. CAPPONI, D. COLOMO, B. CURRIE, K. DOULAMIS, E.W. HANDLEY, A. KERKHECKER, H. MAEHLER, F. MALTOMINI, R. NÜNLIST, J. RADICKE, M. VAN ROSSUM, M. SALEMENOU, C. SCHULER, A. WOUTERS, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXVIII (Nos 4639-4704). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 88.)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4639-4704. - I. New Literary Texts (4639-4652). - II. Known Literary Texts (4653-4668). - III. Subliterary Texts (4669-4674). - IV. Documentary Texts (4675-4704).
